column4: what's the package necessary to do LVM on ubuntu? I installed lvm2 and pvcreate says 'No program "pvcreate" found for your current version of LVM'
maybe lvm got renamed and I didn't notice?
having lvm1 & lvm2 on the same machine will get very confusing
I don't believe lvm1 is available in FF... I'm talking about lvm2 only
